featured.author: Ryan
featured.title: Want To Have A More Appealing Tattoo?
featured.summary: I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment
